document_data.name: Battlebar
document_data.mainbody: '''Battlebar''' was a noble house of [[Cormyr]] in the mid-to-late 14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Base: The family held an estate in the Northbank region of Cormyr.
document_data.Members:
* Lord [[Belophar Battlebar]], head of the house c. [[1368 DR]].
* Lady [[Chalass Battlebar]], daughter of Lord Belophar.
